publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1446 Alex Neil: Scottish Qualifications Agency-That the Parliament notes the eleventh report by the Education, Culture and Sport Committee Exam Results Inquiry (SP Paper 234), and sixth report of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee Inquiry into the Governance of the Scottish Qualifications Authority (SP Paper 232) and urges the Scottish Executive to give urgent consideration to their findings and recommendations. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1446 Scottish Qualifications Authority (lodged on 8 December 2000) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-1446 Scottish Qualifications Authority (lodged on 8 December 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1446 Scottish Qualifications Authority (lodged on 8 December 2000) Michael Russell*
